mapper.select: SELECT id, btype, title, writer, createDate, viewCnt FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM , id, btype, title, writer, createDate, viewCnt FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD_T ORDER BY btype DESC, id DESC) ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_T VALUES(#{id}, #{btype}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{context}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
